name: 薛文景
objective: 本課程在討論應用在骨外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫磷酸鈣骨水泥陶瓷,生醫材料之工程問題。
schedule:
reports1st.-2nd. week/
1. Effects of the granularity of the raw material on the PH in CPC slurry
3rd.-4th. week/
2. Effects of the particles size on the properties
5th. week/
3. Granularuty of raw materials on setting time
6th. week/
4. Raw materials on the compressive strength
7-8th. week/
5. Particles size and their mstch on the rhroloic
Final exam期中報告
10-11. Effects of the granularity of the raw material on the PH in CPC slurry
12. Effects of the particles size on the properties
13. Granularuty of raw materials on setting time
14. Raw materials on the compressive strength
15. Particles size and their mstch on the rhroloic
and the matches on the AC impedance
16th. week/
Final exam 期末考試
